name: mummy

effect.sword-shield: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
effect.the-crown-tundra: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
effect.legends-arceus: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

short_effect: Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.
